page.title: 07HOUSING,INDUSTRY & SCHOOLING
page.content: INDUSTRY IN BURLEY _ No main industry. Mostly garages, small clothes shops, off licences,bakers,joiners,plumbers and public houses. HOUSING ON BRADFORD ROAD,NEWALL AND WESTON LANE-1930's style mainly terraced. A few large houses on Bradford Road, Barratt houses towards Newall. Newer houses are bigger and better. BURLEY_IN_WHARFEDALE MIDDLE SCHOOL_The school is part of the 3_tier system in the local area.It covers the age group 9_13years INDUSTRY IN OTLEY _ No main industry. Many small firms eg.plumbers, joiners, builders, electricians, pubs,hospital and shops. THE FARMLAND AROUND BURLEY _ It is mostly agricultural, but there is some dairy produce from the area.
